title: Can't go into a game after changing monitor
body:
I changed my monitor as shown in the title, but after when I wanted to play a norms game, I can't go into the game.
The game just turns into the resolution of my previous monitor then just crashes, without giving a code or reason for the crash.
been finding the cause of the problem for an hour now, still nothing. Really hope that some of you would help me out.
Thanks for helping me :)

replies.body:
You should be able to resolve this by resetting your input settings file. You can do this by logging in, then heading to your installation locale:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder named **CONFIG**, then hop into a custom match to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if this worked!
I literally had the same problem. In addition to that, I also had to force a Repatch through the Hextech Repair Tool
